data_table.description: Form 146 - Observational Study (OS) Follow-Up Questionnaire (Year 6) -- current weight, recent weight change; current physical activity and exercise (frequency, duration); usual activities; coffee, tea, soft drink, alcohol consumption; current smoking; smoking exposure; existence and recent use of medical care provider, status and types of health insurance; use of natural hormones; use of osteoporosis prescription medications; recent use of hormone replacement therapy; diagnoses of new medical conditions; family history of Alzheimer's; current employment status; current marital status; family finances.

variable.name: WTCUR_6
variable.comment: What is your current weight?

variable.name: WTMAX_6
variable.description: Highest weight in past year lbs
variable.comment: In the past year, what was your highest weight?

variable.name: WTMIN_6
variable.description: Lowest weight in past year lbs
variable.comment: In the past year, what was your lowest weight?

variable.name: LOST5LBP_6
variable.description: In 3 yrs lost 5 lbs on purpose
variable.comment: In the past 3 years, did you lose five or more pounds on purpose at any time?

variable.name: LWPDIET_6
variable.comment: Sub-question of F146 V1 Q4 'In 3-yrs lost 5 lbs on purpose'.

variable.name: LWPEXER_6
variable.comment: Sub-question of F146 V1 Q4 'In 3-yrs lost 5 lbs on purpose'.

variable.name: LWPPPL_6
variable.comment: Prescription diet pill (e.g., Redux, Meridia, Xenical) Sub-question of F146 V1 Q4 'In 3-yrs lost 5 lbs on purpose'.

variable.name: LWPNPPL_6
variable.comment: Over-the-counter diet pill (e.g., Acutrim) Sub-question of F146 V1 Q4 'In 3-yrs lost 5 lbs on purpose'.

variable.name: LWPCMPRG_6
variable.comment: Commercial weight-loss program Sub-question of F146 V1 Q4 'In 3-yrs lost 5 lbs on purpose'.

variable.name: LWPSMKNG_6
variable.comment: Started or increased smoking Sub-question of F146 V1 Q4 'In 3-yrs lost 5 lbs on purpose'.

variable.name: LWPSRGRY_6
variable.comment: Surgical procedure (such as intestinal bypass or stomach balloon) Sub-question of F146 V1 Q4 'In 3-yrs lost 5 lbs on purpose'.

variable.name: LWPOTHER_6
variable.comment: Other (Specify) Sub-question of F146 V1 Q4 'In 3-yrs lost 5 lbs on purpose'.

variable.name: LOST5LBA_6
variable.description: In 3 yrs lost 5 lbs not on purpose
variable.comment: In the past 3 years, did you lose five or more pounds not on purpose at any time?

variable.name: LWAILLNS_6
variable.comment: Sub-question of F146 V1 Q5 'in 3yrs lost 5 lbs not on purp'.

variable.name: LWADEPRS_6
variable.comment: Sub-question of F146 V1 Q5 'in 3yrs lost 5 lbs not on purp'.

variable.name: LWASTRES_6
variable.comment: Sub-question of F146 V1 Q5 'in 3yrs lost 5 lbs not on purp'.

variable.name: LWALEVNT_6
variable.comment: Life events (e.g., change in job or marital status) Sub-question of F146 V1 Q5 'in 3yrs lost 5 lbs not on purp'.

variable.name: LWALSAPP_6
variable.comment: Sub-question of F146 V1 Q5 'in 3yrs lost 5 lbs not on purp'.

variable.name: LWALSTST_6
variable.comment: Loss of taste Sub-question of F146 V1 Q5 'in 3yrs lost 5 lbs not on purp'.

variable.name: LWAOTHER_6
variable.comment: Other (Specify) Sub-question of F146 V1 Q5 'in 3yrs lost 5 lbs not on purp'.

variable.name: LWADNTNO_6
variable.comment: Sub-question of F146 V1 Q5 'in 3yrs lost 5 lbs not on purp'.

variable.name: WALKSWK_6
variable.comment: Think about the walking you do outside the home. How often do you walk outside the home for more than 10 minutes without stopping? (Mark only one.)

variable.name: MINSWALK_6
variable.comment: When you walk outside the home for more than 10 minutes without stopping, for how many minutes do you usually walk? Sub-question of F146 V1 Q6 'Walk more than 10 min'.

variable.name: WALKSPD_6
variable.comment: What is your usual speed? Sub-question of F146 V1 Q6 'Walk more than 10 min'.

variable.name: HDEXFREQ_6
variable.comment: Not including walking outside the home, how often each week (7 days) do you usually do STRENUOUS OR VERY HARD EXERCISE (You work up a sweat and your heart beats fast). For example, aerobics, aerobic dancing, jogging, tennis, swimming laps.

variable.name: HARDMINS_6
variable.comment: How long do usually exercise like this at one time? Sub-question of F146 V1 Q7 'Strenuous exercise'.

variable.name: MDEXFREQ_6
variable.comment: Not including walking outside the home, how often each week (7 days) do you usually do MODERATE EXERCISE (Not exhausting). For example, biking outdoors, use of an exercise machine (like a stationary bike or treadmill), calisthenics, easy swimming, popular and folk dancing.

variable.name: MODMINS_6
variable.comment: How long do usually exercise like this at one time? Sub-question of F146 V1 Q8 'Moderate exercise'.

variable.name: MLEXFREQ_6
variable.comment: Not including walking outside the home, how often each week (7 days) do you usually do MILD EXERCISE. For example, slow dancing, bowling, golf.

variable.name: MILDMINS_6
variable.comment: How long do usually exercise like this at one time? Sub-question of F146 V1 Q9 'Mild exercise'.

variable.name: INDRCHOR_6
variable.comment: About how many hours each week do you usually spend doing heavy (strenuous) indoor household chores such as scrubbing floors, sweeping, or vacuuming?

variable.name: YRDWORKM_6
variable.description: Months of yard work per year
variable.comment: About how many months during the year do you usually do things in the yard, such as mowing, raking, gardening, or shoveling snow?

variable.name: YRDWRKH_6
variable.description: Hours per week doing yard work
variable.comment: When you do these things in the yard, how many hours each week do you do them? Sub-question of F146 V1 Q11 'Months of yard work per year'.

variable.name: SITTING_6
variable.comment: During a usual day and night, about how many hours do you spend sitting? Be sure to include the time you spend sitting at work, sitting at the table eating, driving or riding a car or bus, and sitting up watching TV or talking.

variable.name: SLEEPING_6
variable.comment: During a usual day and night, about how many hours do you spend sleeping or lying down? Be sure to include the time you spend sleeping or trying to sleep at night, resting or napping, and lying down watching TV.

variable.name: CFINDP_6
variable.comment: Caffeinated coffee, either instant or paper-filtered drip (cups)
variable.value: Never or less than 1 per month

variable.name: CFOTHCFE_6
variable.comment: Other caffeinated coffee, such as perked, espresso or latte (cups)
variable.value: Never or less than 1 per month

variable.name: CFDCINDP_6
variable.comment: Decaf coffee, either instant or paper-filtered drip (cups)
variable.value: Never or less than 1 per month

variable.name: CFDCOTH_6
variable.comment: Other decaf coffee, such as perked, espresso or latte (cups)
variable.value: Never or less than 1 per month

variable.name: CFREGTEA_6
variable.comment: Regular tea (not decaf) (cups)
variable.value: Never or less than 1 per month

variable.name: CFDCFTEA_6
variable.comment: Decaf tea (cups)
variable.value: Never or less than 1 per month

variable.name: SODACF_6
variable.comment: Soft drinks with caffeine (such as Coke, Diet Pepsi, Dr. Pepper, Mountain Dew) (12 oz. Can)
variable.value: Never or less than 1 per month

variable.name: SODANOCF_6
variable.comment: Soft drinks without caffeine (such as Sprite, 7-Up, Diet Sprite) (12 oz. can)
variable.value: Never or less than 1 per month

variable.name: ALC3MO_6
variable.comment:
During the past 3 months, have you had any drinks containing alcohol? Skip patterns not applied
Back-coded from sub-questions.

variable.name: ALCOFTEN_6
variable.comment:
In the past 3 months, how often have you had drinks containing alcohol? Sub-question of F146 V1 Q15 'Alcohol in past 3 mnths'.
(skip pattern not applied)
variable.value: One day per month or less

variable.name: DRNKSDAY_6
variable.comment:
In the past 3 months, on the days you drank, how many drinks did you usually have per day? (A drink is a 12 ounce glass of beer, one 4 ounce glass of wine, or one shot [1 1/4 oz.] of liquor) Sub-question of F146 V1 Q15 'Alcohol in past 3 mnths'.
(skip pattern not applied)

variable.name: NOMLDRNK_6
variable.comment:
In the past 3 months, on the days you drank, how many of those drinks did you usually drink that were not around a major meal (not around lunch, not around dinner)? Sub-question of F146 V1 Q15 'Alcohol in past 3 mnths'.
(skip pattern not applied)

variable.name: SPECOCCS_6
variable.comment: Do you drink more than usual for special occasions? Sub-question of F146 V1 Q15 'Alcohol in past 3 mnths'.

variable.name: SPCOCOFT_6
variable.description: How often drink on special occasions
variable.comment:
How often does this happen? Sub-question of F146 V1 Q15 'Alcohol in past 3 mnths'.
Sub-question of F146 V1 Q15.4 'Drinking on special occasions'.
(skip pattern not applied)

variable.name: AHABCHNG_6
variable.comment: In the past 3 years have you changed your alcohol drinking habits?

variable.name: AHOWCHNG_6
variable.comment: How have you changed your alcohol drinking? Have you: Sub-question of F146 V1 Q16 'Changed your drinking habits'.

variable.name: AWHYCHNG_6
variable.description: Why did you make change to drinking
variable.comment: Why did you make this change? (Mark one.) Sub-question of F146 V1 Q16 'Changed your drinking habits'.

variable.name: SMOKENW_6
variable.comment: Do you smoke cigarettes now?

variable.name: CIGSDAY_6
variable.comment: How many cigarettes do you usually smoke each day? (Mark one.) Sub-question of F146 V1 Q17 'Smoke cigarettes now'.

variable.name: LIVSMK_6
variable.description: Does any smoker live with you
variable.comment: Does anyone living with you now smoke cigarettes regularly inside your home?

variable.name: HSBNDSMK_6
variable.comment: Sub-question of F146 V1 Q18 'Does any smoker live with you'.

variable.name: CHILDSMK_6
variable.comment: Son(s) or daughter(s) Sub-question of F146 V1 Q18 'Does any smoker live with you'.

variable.name: OTHSMK_6
variable.comment: Other person/people Sub-question of F146 V1 Q18 'Does any smoker live with you'.

variable.name: SMKWORK_6
variable.comment: Do you now work in a space where people smoke cigarettes?

variable.name: CAREPROV_6
variable.description: Have a usual medical care provider
variable.comment: Do you have a clinic, doctor, nurse, or physician assistant who provides your usual medical care?

variable.name: LSTVIS_6
variable.description: When last visit usual med care provider
variable.comment: When did you last visit this clinic or person? (Please give your best guess.) Sub-question of F146 V1 Q20 'Have doctors, nurse, assistant'.

variable.name: NEWDR3Y_6
variable.description: Health care provider changed last 3 yrs
variable.comment: Has your usual health care provider changed in the past 3 years? Sub-question of F146 V1 Q20 'Have doctors, nurse, assistant'.

variable.name: HLTHINSR_6
variable.description: Do you currently have health insurance
variable.comment: Do you currently have health insurance? This includes pre-paid private insurance such as Health Maintenance Organization (HMO), other private insurance, Medicare, Medicaid (including State Medical Assistance or Medi-Cal), or Miliary or Veterans Administration health care coverage.

variable.name: DRSCVRED_6
variable.comment: Which of the following best describes the doctors and hospitals covered by your current health insurance? Sub-question of F146 V1 Q21 'Do you have health insurance'.
variable.value: Benefits are same for doctors I choose
I can use any doctors or hospital
I can only choose from a restricted list

variable.name: INSPREPD_6
variable.comment: Pre-paid private insurance, such as a Health Maintenance Organization (HMO), Kaiser Permanente or other Group Health-type plan?

variable.name: PPEMPPD_6
variable.comment:
Pre-paid/Costs are paid by my employer or my spouse's employer Sub-question of F146 V1 Q22 'Do you have any of the following health ins'.
Sub-question of F146 V1 Q22.1 'Prepaid private insurance/HMO'.

variable.name: PPMEPD_6
variable.description: Prepaid who pays/costs paid by me
variable.comment:
Pre-paid/Costs are paid by me Sub-question of F146 V1 Q22 'Do you have any of the following health ins'.
Sub-question of F146 V1 Q22.1 'Prepaid private insurance/HMO'.

variable.name: PPMEDPD_6
variable.comment:
Pre-paid/Medicare Sub-question of F146 V1 Q22 'Do you have any of the following health ins'.
Sub-question of F146 V1 Q22.1 'Prepaid private insurance/HMO'.

variable.name: INSOTHPV_6
variable.comment: Other private insurance such as Blue Cross, Aetna, etc.? Sub-question of F146 V1 Q22 'Do you have any of the following health ins'.

variable.name: PRVEMPPD_6
variable.comment:
Other/Costs are paid by my employer or my spouse's employer Sub-question of F146 V1 Q22 'Do you have any of the following health ins'.
Sub-question of F146 V1 Q22.3 'Other private insurance'.

variable.name: PRVMEPD_6
variable.description: Other private who pays/costs paid by me
variable.comment:
Other/Costs are paid by me Sub-question of F146 V1 Q22 'Do you have any of the following health ins'.
Sub-question of F146 V1 Q22.3 'Other private insurance'.

variable.name: INSMEDCR_6
variable.comment: Sub-question of F146 V1 Q22 'Do you have any of the following health ins'.

variable.name: MEDADDCV_6
variable.comment:
Do you have additional coverage to supplement your Medicare benefits? Sub-question of F146 V1 Q22 'Do you have any of the following health ins'.
Sub-question of F146 V1 Q22.5 'Medicare'.

variable.name: INSMDCAD_6
variable.comment: Medicaid, including State Medical Assistance (for example, Medi-Cal) Sub-question of F146 V1 Q22 'Do you have any of the following health ins'.

variable.name: INSMLTRY_6
variable.comment: Military or Veterans Administration-sponsored? Sub-question of F146 V1 Q22 'Do you have any of the following health ins'.

variable.name: INSOTHER_6
variable.comment: Sub-question of F146 V1 Q22 'Do you have any of the following health ins'.

variable.name: NATHOR_6
variable.comment: In the past year, did you use any natural hormones that you can get without a doctor's prescription? These are usually made from plants and often obtained from health food stores or by mail order. They may be in the form of a pill, vaginal cream or suppository, or skin cream.

variable.name: YAMCRM_6
variable.comment: Sub-question of F146 V1 Q23 'Natural hormones in past year'.

variable.name: YAMPLS_6
variable.comment: Sub-question of F146 V1 Q23 'Natural hormones in past year'.

variable.name: PRGCRM_6
variable.comment: Sub-question of F146 V1 Q23 'Natural hormones in past year'.

variable.name: PRGSUP_6
variable.comment: Progesterone suppositories Sub-question of F146 V1 Q23 'Natural hormones in past year'.

variable.name: DHEAPL_6
variable.comment: DHEA (dehydroepiandosterone pills) Sub-question of F146 V1 Q23 'Natural hormones in past year'.

variable.name: PHYPLS_6
variable.comment: Phytoestrogen pills or powder (soy or flax) Sub-question of F146 V1 Q23 'Natural hormones in past year'.

variable.name: PHYCRM_6
variable.comment: Phytoestrogen creams (soy or flax) Sub-question of F146 V1 Q23 'Natural hormones in past year'.

variable.name: PHYFDS_6
variable.comment: Phytoestrogen enriched foods (tofu, soybeans) Sub-question of F146 V1 Q23 'Natural hormones in past year'.

variable.name: NTOTHR_6
variable.comment: Other (Specify) Sub-question of F146 V1 Q23 'Natural hormones in past year'.

variable.name: NTDNTK_6
variable.comment: Sub-question of F146 V1 Q23 'Natural hormones in past year'.

variable.name: OSTPL_6
variable.comment: In the past year, have you used Fosamax (alendronate) or Calcitonin?

variable.name: OSTALND_6
variable.comment: Sub-question of F146 V1 Q24 'Used Fasomax or Calcitonin?'.

variable.name: OSTCALC_6
variable.comment: Sub-question of F146 V1 Q24 'Used Fasomax or Calcitonin?'.

variable.name: OSTUNTK_6
variable.description: Don't know what kind of osteoporosis medication
variable.comment: Sub-question of F146 V1 Q24 'Used Fasomax or Calcitonin?'.

variable.name: SRM_6
variable.comment: In the past year, did you use any non-estrogen prescription treatments for hormone replacement? These may be prescribed to prevent osteoporosis and breast cancer and are sometimes called 'designer estrogens' or selective estrogen receptor modulators (SERMs). Examples are Evista (Raloxifene) and Nolvadex (Tamoxifen).

variable.name: SRMEVST_6
variable.comment: Sub-question of F146 V1 Q25 'Use non-estrogen prescription?'.

variable.name: SRMNOLU_6
variable.comment: Sub-question of F146 V1 Q25 'Use non-estrogen prescription?'.

variable.name: SRMOTHR_6
variable.comment: Other (Specify) Sub-question of F146 V1 Q25 'Use non-estrogen prescription?'.

variable.name: SRMDNTK_6
variable.comment: Sub-question of F146 V1 Q25 'Use non-estrogen prescription?'.

variable.name: HRPST1YR_6
variable.comment: In the past year, did you use any female hormones (ESTROGEN or PROGESTERONE [also called PROGESTIN] that were prescribed by a doctor? (This may have been in the form of a pill, skin patch, shots, or vaginal cream or suppository.)

variable.name: EPPLPA_6
variable.comment: In the past year, did you use female hormone PILLS or PATCHES prescribed by a doctor which contained both ESTROGEN and progestin (PROGESTERONE) COMBINED in the same pill, patch, or package (for example, Prempro, Premphase)? (Do not include use of two separate estrogen and progestin pills used at the same time.) Sub-question of F146 V1 Q26 'Used female hormones/past year'.

variable.name: EPDUR_6
variable.comment:
In the past year, how many months did you use COMBINED female hormone PILLS or PATCH which contained both ESTROGEN and PROGESTIN? Sub-question of F146 V1 Q26 'Used female hormones/past year'.
Sub-question of F146 V1 Q27 'Comb estr/progest pills/patch'.

variable.name: EPTYPE_6
variable.comment:
Which combination did you use the longest? Sub-question of F146 V1 Q26 'Used female hormones/past year'.
Sub-question of F146 V1 Q27 'Comb estr/progest pills/patch'.

variable.name: ETPL_6
variable.comment: In the past year, did you use female hormone PILLS prescribed by a doctor which contained both ESTROGEN and TESTOSTERONE COMBINED in the same pill (for example, Estratest)? Sub-question of F146 V1 Q26 'Used female hormones/past year'.

variable.name: ETDUR_6
variable.comment:
In the past year, how many months did you use COMBINED female hormone PILLS which contained both ESTROGEN and TESTOSTERONE? Sub-question of F146 V1 Q26 'Used female hormones/past year'.
Sub-question of F146 V1 Q28 'Combined estr/testost pills'.

variable.name: ETTYPE_6
variable.comment:
In the past year, what type of COMBINED ESTROGEN and TESTOSTERONE pill did you use the longest? Sub-question of F146 V1 Q26 'Used female hormones/past year'.
Sub-question of F146 V1 Q28 'Combined estr/testost pills'.

variable.name: E_6
variable.comment: In the past year, did you use any ESTROGEN pill, patch, cream or shots (other than the combination described in Qxs 27 and 28)? Sub-question of F146 V1 Q26 'Used female hormones/past year'.

variable.name: EPL_6
variable.description: Did you use any Estrogen pill
variable.comment:
Did you use an estrogen pill? Sub-question of F146 V1 Q26 'Used female hormones/past year'.
Sub-question of F146 V1 Q29 'Estrogen pill,patch,cream,shot'.

variable.name: EPLDUR_6
variable.comment:
For how many months did you use the Estrogen pills? Sub-question of F146 V1 Q26 'Used female hormones/past year'.
Sub-question of F146 V1 Q29 'Estrogen pill,patch,cream,shot'.
Sub-question of F146 V1 Q29.1 'Did you use any Estrogen pill'.

variable.name: EPLTYPE_6
variable.comment:
What kind did you take? (Mark the one used the longest if you used more than one kind.) Sub-question of F146 V1 Q26 'Used female hormones/past year'.
Sub-question of F146 V1 Q29 'Estrogen pill,patch,cream,shot'.
Sub-question of F146 V1 Q29.1 'Did you use any Estrogen pill'.

variable.name: EPCH_6
variable.description: Did you use an estrogen patch?
variable.comment:
Sub-question of F146 V1 Q26 'Used female hormones/past year'.
Sub-question of F146 V1 Q29 'Estrogen pill,patch,cream,shot'.
On forms 143-145 this variable reflects estrogen use with or without progesterone.

variable.name: EPCHDUR_6
variable.comment:
For how many months did you use the patch? Sub-question of F146 V1 Q26 'Used female hormones/past year'.
Sub-question of F146 V1 Q29 'Estrogen pill,patch,cream,shot'.
Sub-question of F146 V1 Q29.4 'Did you use an estrogen patch?'.

variable.name: ECRM_6
variable.description: Did you use an estrogen cream?
variable.comment:
Sub-question of F146 V1 Q26 'Used female hormones/past year'.
Sub-question of F146 V1 Q29 'Estrogen pill,patch,cream,shot'.

variable.name: ECRMDUR_6
variable.comment:
For how many months did you use the cream? Sub-question of F146 V1 Q26 'Used female hormones/past year'.
Sub-question of F146 V1 Q29 'Estrogen pill,patch,cream,shot'.
Sub-question of F146 V1 Q29.6 'Did you use an estrogen cream?'.

variable.name: ESHT_6
variable.comment:
Did you have estrogen shots? Sub-question of F146 V1 Q26 'Used female hormones/past year'.
Sub-question of F146 V1 Q29 'Estrogen pill,patch,cream,shot'.

variable.name: ESHTDUR_6
variable.comment:
For how many months did you have the shots? Sub-question of F146 V1 Q26 'Used female hormones/past year'.
Sub-question of F146 V1 Q29 'Estrogen pill,patch,cream,shot'.
Sub-question of F146 V1 Q29.8 'Estrogen shots'.

variable.name: P_6
variable.comment: In the past year, did you use any PROGESTERONE or PROGESTIN pill, cream, or shots (other than the combinations described in Quextion 27)? Sub-question of F146 V1 Q26 'Used female hormones/past year'.

variable.name: PPL_6
variable.comment:
Did you use a progesterone or progestin pill or capsule? Sub-question of F146 V1 Q26 'Used female hormones/past year'.
Sub-question of F146 V1 Q30 'Progesterone pill, cream shot'.

variable.name: PPLDUR_6
variable.comment:
For how many months did you use the pill or capsule? Sub-question of F146 V1 Q26 'Used female hormones/past year'.
Sub-question of F146 V1 Q30 'Progesterone pill, cream shot'.
Sub-question of F146 V1 Q30.1 'Progesterone pill or capsule'.

variable.name: PPLTYPE_6
variable.comment:
What kind did you take (Mark the one used the longest if you used more than one kind)? Sub-question of F146 V1 Q26 'Used female hormones/past year'.
Sub-question of F146 V1 Q30 'Progesterone pill, cream shot'.
Sub-question of F146 V1 Q30.1 'Progesterone pill or capsule'.

variable.name: PPLDAY_6
variable.comment:
How many days per month did you use it? Sub-question of F146 V1 Q26 'Used female hormones/past year'.
Sub-question of F146 V1 Q30 'Progesterone pill, cream shot'.
Sub-question of F146 V1 Q30.1 'Progesterone pill or capsule'.

variable.name: PCRM_6
variable.comment:
Did you use a progesterone or progestin cream? Sub-question of F146 V1 Q26 'Used female hormones/past year'.
Sub-question of F146 V1 Q30 'Progesterone pill, cream shot'.

variable.name: PCRMDUR_6
variable.comment:
For how many months did you use progesterone or progestin cream? Sub-question of F146 V1 Q26 'Used female hormones/past year'.
Sub-question of F146 V1 Q30 'Progesterone pill, cream shot'.
Sub-question of F146 V1 Q30.5 'Progesterone/Progestin cream'.

variable.name: PSHT_6
variable.comment:
Did you have progesterone or progestin shots? Sub-question of F146 V1 Q26 'Used female hormones/past year'.
Sub-question of F146 V1 Q30 'Progesterone pill, cream shot'.

variable.name: PSHTDUR_6
variable.comment:
For how many months did you have progesterone or progestin shots Sub-question of F146 V1 Q26 'Used female hormones/past year'.
Sub-question of F146 V1 Q30 'Progesterone pill, cream shot'.
Sub-question of F146 V1 Q30.7 'Have progesterone shots'.

variable.name: MACDEGNR_6
variable.comment: Macular degeneration of the retina

variable.name: EMPHYSEM_6
variable.comment: Emphysema or chronic bronchitis

variable.name: CHF_6
variable.comment: Heart failure or congestive heart failure

variable.name: ANGINA_6
variable.comment: Angina (chest pains from the heart)

variable.name: KIDNEYST_6
variable.comment: Kidney or bladder stones (renal or urinary calculi)

variable.name: KIDDIALY_6
variable.comment: Dialysis for kidney or renal failure

variable.name: PANCREAT_6
variable.comment: Pancreatitis (inflamed pancreas)

variable.name: LIVRDIS_6
variable.comment: Liver disease (chronic active hepatitis, cirrhosis, or yellow jaundice)

variable.name: ALS_6
variable.comment: Amyotropic Lateral Sclerosis (ALS, motor neuron disease, or Lou Gehrig's disease)

variable.name: ALZREL_6
variable.comment: Has any member of your biological family (mother, father, sister, or brother) been diagnosed with Alzheimer's disease or senile dementia?

variable.name: ALZMOM_6
variable.comment: Sub-question of F146 V1 Q32 'Family members w/ Alzheimer's'.

variable.name: ALZDAD_6
variable.comment: Sub-question of F146 V1 Q32 'Family members w/ Alzheimer's'.

variable.name: ALZBRO_6
variable.comment: Any brother Sub-question of F146 V1 Q32 'Family members w/ Alzheimer's'.

variable.name: ALZSIS_6
variable.comment: Any sister Sub-question of F146 V1 Q32 'Family members w/ Alzheimer's'.

variable.name: HOMEMKR_6
variable.comment: Current job - Homemaker, raising children, care of others

variable.name: EMPLOYED_6
variable.comment: Current job - Employed (full or part-time)

variable.name: DISABLED_6
variable.comment: Current job - Disabled, unable to work

variable.name: OTHWRK_6
variable.comment: Current job - Other (Specify)

variable.name: MARITAL_6
variable.comment: What is your current marital status? (Mark the one that best describes you.
variable.value: Living in a marriage like relationship

variable.name: PNOTWRK_6
variable.comment: Husband/partner job - Not working Sub-question of F146 V1 Q34 'Current marital status'.

variable.name: PRETIRED_6
variable.comment: Husband/partner job - Retired Sub-question of F146 V1 Q34 'Current marital status'.

variable.name: PHOMEMKR_6
variable.comment: Husband/partner job - Homemaker, raising children, care of others Sub-question of F146 V1 Q34 'Current marital status'.

variable.name: PEMPLOY_6
variable.comment: Husband/partner job - Employed (full or part-time) Sub-question of F146 V1 Q34 'Current marital status'.

variable.name: PDISABLE_6
variable.comment: Husband/partner job - Disabled, unable to work Sub-question of F146 V1 Q34 'Current marital status'.

variable.name: POTHWRK_6
variable.comment: Husband/partner job - Other (Specify) Sub-question of F146 V1 Q34 'Current marital status'.

variable.name: HSHLDALL_6
variable.comment: How many people, including yourself, live in your household as members of your family (whom you support or who contribute to supporting your family)?

variable.name: HSHLDLS18_6
variable.description: How many under 18 years in household
variable.comment: How many of these people are under 18 years old?

variable.name: HSHLD1864
variable.description: How many betw 18-64 years in household
variable.comment: How many are between 18 and 64 years old (including yourself)?

variable.name: HSHLDGR65
variable.description: How many 65 yrs and older in household
variable.comment: How many are 65 years or older (including yourself)?

variable.name: INCOME_6
variable.comment: What was the total family income (before taxes) from all sources within your household (including paychecks, social security, retirement income, and public assistance) in the last year? (Mark the one that is your best guess.)

variable.name: STNDLIVG_6
variable.description: How long maintain standard of living
variable.comment: If you lost the sources of household income listed in Question 36, how long could you continue to live at your current address and standard of living? (Mark the one that is your best guess.)

variable.name: FAMSAVNG_6
variable.comment: Altogether, what is your current total family savings, assets, retirement and pensions plans, and property from all sources within your household? (Include the total value of your home and car(s) minus the amounts still owed.) (Mark the one that is your best guess.)

variable.name: FAMDEBT_6
variable.comment: What is the total family debt within your household from such things as credit card charges, medical or legal bills, and loans from banks or relatives? (Do not include mortgage or car loans. (Mark the one that is your best guess.)

variable.name: HRDTM1YR_6
variable.description: Hard time making ends meet 1 year ago
variable.comment: 1 year ago, did you have a hard time making ends meet (paying rent, buying food, paying for other necessities)?

variable.name: HRDTM2YR_6
variable.description: Hard time making ends meet 2 years ago
variable.comment: 2 years ago, did you have a hard time making ends meet (paying rent, buying food, paying for other necessities)?

variable.name: HRDTM3YR_6
variable.description: Hard time making ends meet 3 years ago
variable.comment: 3 years ago, did you have a hard time making ends meet (paying rent, buying food, paying for other necessities)?

variable.name: FINAN1YR_6
variable.comment: Compared to this year, were your finances better off, the same, or worse off 1 year ago?

variable.name: FINAN2YR_6
variable.comment: Compared to this year, were your finances better off, the same, or worse off 2 years ago?

variable.name: FINAN3YR_6
variable.comment: Compared to this year, were your finances better off, the same, or worse off 3 years ago?

variable.name: HHOLDFD_6
variable.comment: Which one of these statements best describes the food eaten in your household in the last year?
variable.value: Enough to eat of desired kind
Enough to eat not always of desired kind
Sometimes did not have enough food
Often did not have enough food to eat

variable.name: FDASSTMW_6
variable.comment: Food program - Meals on Wheels

variable.name: FDASSTFR_6
variable.comment: Food program - Free or reduced cost meals for the elderly

variable.name: FDASSTUS_6
variable.comment: Food program - USDA or government commodity foods

variable.name: FDASSTFS_6
variable.comment: Food program - Food stamps, free or reduced cost school lunches, WIC (Women, Infant, and Children Feeding Program), or free or reduced-cost meals at day care or Head Start

variable.name: FDASSTFB_6
variable.comment: Food program - Community Food Bank or Pantry or other free food or food vouchers

variable.name: TEPIWK_6
variable.description: Episodes recreational phys activity per week
variable.comment: Computed from Form 146, questions 6, 7, 8, and 9. Total number of episodes per week of recreational physical activity (includes walking, mild, moderate and strenuous physical activity).

variable.name: LEPITOT_6
variable.description: Episode recreational phys activity per week >= 20 Min
variable.comment: Computed from Form 146, questions 6, 6.1, 7, 7.1, 8, 8.1, 9, and 9.1. Episodes per week of recreational physical activity of >=20 minutes duration (includes walking, mild, moderate and strenuous physical activity).

variable.name: MSEPIWK_6
variable.description: Episodes moderate to strenuous phys activity per week
variable.comment: Computed from Form 146, questions 6.2, 7, and 8 Episodes per week of moderate and strenuous recreational physical activity (includes walking fairly fast or very fast, moderate physical activity and strenuous physical activity).

variable.name: XLMSEPI_6
variable.description: Episodes moderate to strenuous activity >= 20 min/week
variable.comment: Computed from Form 146, questions 6, 6.1, 6.2, 7, 7.1, 8 and 8.1. Episodes per week of moderate and strenuous recreational physical activity of >=20 minutes duration (includes walking fairly fast or very fast, moderate physical activity and strenuous physical activity).

variable.name: LMSEPI_6
variable.description: Episodes moderate to strenuous activity >=20 min/week (categorical)
variable.comment: Computed from Form 146, questions 6, 6.1, 6.2, 7, 7.1, 8, and 8.1. Categorical variable of episodes per week of moderate and strenuous recreational physical activity of >= 20 minutes duration (includes walking fairly fast or very fast, moderate physical activity and strenuous physical activity). Computed from XLMSEPI and TEPIWK.

variable.name: SEPIWK_6
variable.comment: Computed from Form 146, question 7. Episodes per week of strenuous recreational physical activity.

variable.name: TMINWK_6
variable.description: Minutes of recreational phys activity per week
variable.comment: Computed from Form 146, questions 6, 6.1, 7, 7.1, 8, 8.1, 9, and 9.1. Total minutes per week of recreational physical activity (includes walking, mild, moderate and strenuous physical activity).

variable.name: MSMINWK_6
variable.description: Minutes of moderate to strenuous activity per week
variable.comment: Computed from Form 146, questions 6, 6.1, 6.2, 7, and 8. Minutes per week of moderate and strenuous recreational physical activity (includes walking fairly fast or very fast, moderate physical activity and strenuous physical activity).

variable.name: SMINWK_6
variable.description: Minutes of strenuous phys activity per week
variable.comment: Computed from Form 146, questions 7 and 7.1. Minutes per week of strenuous recreational physical activity.

variable.name: TEXPWK_6
variable.description: Total energy expend from recreational phys. activity (MET-hours/week)
variable.comment: Computed from Form 146, questions 6, 6.1, 6.2, 7, 7.1, 8, 8.1, 9 and 9.1 . Total MET-hours per week. Expenditure of energy from recreational physical activity (includes walking, mild, moderate and strenuous physical activity in kcal/week/kg).

variable.name: WALKEXP_6
variable.comment: Computed from Form 146, questions 6, 6.1, and 6.2. Expenditure of energy from physical activity from walking in kcal/week/kg (MET-hours per week).

variable.name: AVWKEXP_6
variable.comment: Computed from Form 146, questions 6, 6.1 and 6.2. Energy expenditure from average walking (2-3 mph) in MET-hours per week. If question 6.2 (speed of walking) was marked as 'don't know' or was missing, the speed was assumed to be 2-3 mph.

variable.name: FFWKEXP_6
variable.description: Energy expend from walking fairly fast (MET-hours/week)
variable.comment: Computed from Form 146, questions 6, 6.1 and 6.2 energy expenditure form walking fairly fast (3-4 mph) in MET-hours per week.

variable.name: VFWKEXP_6
variable.description: Energy expend from walking very fast (MET-hours/week)
variable.comment: Computed from Form 146, questions 6, 6.1 and 6.2 Energy expenditure from walking very fast (> 4 mph) in MET-hours per week.

variable.name: HARDEXP_6
variable.comment: Computed from Form 146, questions 7 and 7.1. Energy expenditure from strenuous or very hard exercise (for example, aerobics, aerobic dancing, jogging, tennis, swimming laps) in MET-hours per week.

variable.name: MODEXP_6
variable.comment: Computed from Form 146, questions 8 and 8.1. Energy expenditure from moderate exercise (for example, biking outdoors, using an exercise machine, calisthenics, easy swimming, popular or folk dancing) in MET-hours per week.

variable.name: MILDEXP_6
variable.comment: Computed from Form 146, questions 9 and 9.1. Energy expenditure from mild exercise (for example, slow dancing, bowling, golf) in MET-hours per week.

variable.name: EST_6
variable.comment: Computed from Form 146, questions 26, 27, 28, 29, 29.1 and 29.4

variable.name: PRG_6
variable.comment: Computed from form 146, questions 26, 27, 30 and 30.1.

variable.name: HRT_6
variable.description: Hormone use last year (estrogen or progesterone)
variable.comment: Computed from variables 'Progesterone use last year' and 'Estrogen use last year'.
